column2: Transform this mortal man into a God!
Transform this mortal woman into a Goddess!
Transform this mortal man into a Demi God!
Transform this mortal woman into a Demi Goddess!
Heals the body of the individual from all deformities and deseases.
As the first god you can revoke god-like powers from others.
Instantly kill this mortal with your godly powers.
